# ARMatteGenerator.Resolution.full

**Case**

An option that specifies the full camera image resolution.

## Declaration

```swift
case full
```

## Choosing a Resolution Option

- **ARMatteGenerator.Resolution.half**: An option that specifies half of the camera image resolution.
